locations.title: Our customers
locations.subtitle: Small businesses using bzz.one are everywhere!

1.question: How quickly can I expect a response?
1.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. Pro and Business plan customers receive priority support with faster response times.

2.question: Can I get help setting up my store?
2.answer: Absolutely! We offer personalized onboarding for Business plan customers. For Free and Pro plans, we have detailed guides and our support team is always ready to answer specific questions.

3.question: Do you offer custom development?
3.answer: Yes, for Business plan customers, we can provide custom development services to meet specific needs. Contact our sales team to discuss your requirements and get a quote.
